activities: Personal information may be gathered from our web-based software systems. This information may include names and addresses voluntarily entered by users of the system. This information is used to authenticate users to our software. Users are notified under the NOTICE section of the policy, and allowed to opt-out. Personal information is only gathered for the purpose of identifying users who have chosen to be identified. Guest users are allowed to use the software with no personal information gathered at their discression.
